name: cosyma
short_description:
COSYMA is the attempt to collect various solutions in the area of co-simulation based energy system analysis and to unify them to one, open solution by cherry-picking the best parts of all contributions.

The platform is expected to cover
- hybrid models (i.e., discrete, continuous, etc.)
- multi rate models (i.e. quick and slow submodels)
- real time and offline mode
summary: CO-simulation based energy SYstem Modeling plAtform

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: BSD License
